Text: Welcome to the SellOffVacationscom email update offering you specials and discountedprices not available on our web siteWelcome to the SellOffVacationscom email update offering you specials and discounted prices not available on our web site SellOffVacationscom is Canadas number one online vacation web site offering you discounts on vacation packages by Canadas biggest and best tour companies We sell the exact same vacation staying at the same hotel flying with the same airline eating the same food drinking the same drinks but enjoying yourself that much more knowing that you booked at SellOffVacationscom and you paid much much less than those who booked elsewhere And remember that as a member of TICO ont lic with SellOffVacationscom your funds are safe should there be an unexpected closure or bankruptcy Be aware that if you book your vacation directly with the airlines cruise lines hotels and car rental companies your money is most likely unprotected in the event of a bankruptcy This week if you make a reservation by CALLING our office using the numbers below you will save an extra on your vacation package when you quote code CUWTBWMU thats off the already reduced discount fares found on our web site book by November SellOffVacationscom also handles reservations for Air Canadas Tango and West Jet Airlines and remember with us your funds are protected NOW YOU CAN BOOK YOUR FAVORITE HOLIDAY DESTINATIONS ONLINE Your best source for package holidays from Canada in the area or toll free SellOffs in Canada USA All reservations handled by Dream Vacations Inc Lic Comments mailto ellOffVacationscom Mon Fri am to pm Sat Sun am to pm EST Make your reservation online hours days a week to remove yourself from this list please send email to mailto with the word remove in the subject line
